General.Name: Guangdong Dongfang Precision Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Dongfang Precision Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and design, development, production, sale, and servicing of corrugated packaging equipment in China and internationally. The company offers corrugator lines used for the production of corrugated boards; intelligent corrugated packaging machinery used to produce and process corrugated boards into corrugated boxes; intelligent plant platform to help the customers realise a digital and network-based equipment layer, connect business, cash, and information flows; and outboard motor products used in water recreation, fishing, water traffic, emergency rescue, shore landing, and maritime patrol. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Foshan, the People's Republic of China.
